data.description: Parse Action Request (AR) System log files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Parse::Syslog provides a useful interface to read UNIX syslog
    files. Parse::ARlog provides similar functionality for Remedy AR
    System log files. Unfortunately the log file format isn't similar
    enough to make inheritance worthwhile and so this is a stand-alone
    module.
